org.opensaml.soap.soap11.decoder.http.impl

Class HTTPSOAP11Decoder<MessageType extends org.opensaml.core.xml.XMLObject>

  • java.lang.Object

  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - the message type of the message context on which to operate
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.Component, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.DestructableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.InitializableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.UnmodifiableComponent, org.opensaml.messaging.decoder.MessageDecoder<MessageType>, org.opensaml.messaging.decoder.servlet.HttpServletRequestMessageDecoder<MessageType>

    public class HTTPSOAP11Decoder<MessageType extends org.opensaml.core.xml.XMLObject>
extends org.opensaml.messaging.decoder.servlet.BaseHttpServletRequestXMLMessageDecoder<MessageType>
    Basic SOAP 1.1 decoder for HTTP transport.

    This decoder takes a mandatory MessageHandler instance which is used to determine populate the message that is returned as the MessageContext.getMessage().

    A SOAP message oriented message exchange style might just populate the Envelope as the message. An application-specific payload-oriented message exchange would handle a specific type of payload structure.
